website_summaries.verdict: High-grade wireless microphone system for professionals who don't mind paying the price.
pros: Durable product with a very strong signal, long battery life, and excellent sound quality
The system is built for professionals, is easy to use, and works right out of the box
cons: It's sturdy build isn't as aesthetically pleasing as some may like
Wearing it for extended periods may take some getting used to
May require a license for operation in some locations

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for group fitness classes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with ION rock box to teach fitness classes at a local gym. It works amazingly well and super comfortable to wear. Battery life is great in the headset. I think this is the best brand for a wireless mic.
customer_reviews.author: Radiojoy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone can tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: In a place where they've always used average quality, wired microphones, when you plug one of these suddenly you turn legendary. The output is superb. Very bright, crisp, toned voice people will love it and so will you. The headset feels a bit uncomfortable the first times but that's because it's brand new so you have to pretty much break them in. Eventually they feel great. A volume knob at a handy place would have been great. There's a volume dial but it's in the battery compartment and it's not practical. All in all still a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: PAY MORE, GET LESS FROM SHURE
customer_reviews.text: Only bought this headset since my Shure PGX4 no longer worked due to FCC 600 Mhz ban. Did not come with a carrying case. My old Shure came with a sturdy case, foam cut out inside. The receiver, transmitter and definitely the headset are far inferior and more cheaply constructed than my old Shure. Receiver made of thin plastic and seems fragile. Headset does not fit nearly as well as my previous Shure. I'm surprised it worked when I hooked it up to mixer. Amazon charged over 8% sales tax or $25 plus shipping. Definitely no bargain at over $325.
customer_reviews.author: WILDBILLDANCE

customer_reviews.title: There customer service is good. They took care of the issue
customer_reviews.text: Range was disappointing, about 20ft. Cord on headset not able to hold up to daily class use for more than several months. After taking the headset connector apart and resoldering the wires, and beefing up the strain relief, I haven't had any more problems. I had to send one unit back to Shure. There customer service is good. They took care of the issue, and got it back to me quickly.

customer_reviews.title: The unit worked for 23 months with no problem but now failed
customer_reviews.text: Headset microphone is suspect in inoperative condition because it stopped transmitting and only produces static. I just ordered a new PGA31 headset for $39.00. We will see if this is the problem
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey Guy

customer_reviews.title: Shure blX14/P31 is pretty straight forward and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Shure blX14/P31 is pretty straight forward and functions perfectly. Took me awhile to get used to the head set but that is only because I'm old school. I've gotten pretty used to it since then. We use it in a room that occupies up to 75 people and it is more than sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Melton

customer_reviews.title: great clarity
customer_reviews.text: very clear and worth it for parties, used as a mascot and it save my voice and it was great amplification unlike the cheaper options....definitely a good purchase...consider if you need the dual channel or solo...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing outdoor performance
customer_reviews.text: Worked well indoors but fed back terribly outdoors through the same system. Also, very uncomfortable on my head. Will go back to my hand held wireless.
customer_reviews.author: partyartie

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Mic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A great top quality product. It meets all your expectations and more because it has a great battery life, great sensitivity, and also a great distance. I could not have asked for better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good wireless headset mic for the price. Shure is a very God and reliable name.
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset wireless in my mobile DJ service. The mic ball is big but the pick up is nice and the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Music

customer_reviews.title: Shure, it works
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd wireless Shure mic in 20 years. It's a Shure, It works, it's reliable, and sounds good. Price is better then my earlier mics.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good system that everyone will notice.
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid performer and there have not been any drop offs at this point. The mike is rater large and it makes the pastor look more like an air traffic controller. It does its job but you have to overlook the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kai K.

customer_reviews.title: feels cheap compare to other low end shure (like the ...
customer_reviews.text: feels cheap compare to other low end shure (like the pg version). Very cheap plastic feel. otherwise it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice so far and it seems to do exactly what I expected out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson J Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not really wireless!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not wireless. Pictures show that the microphone is wireless but it is not. The only way it is wireless is that you can walk around with the whole unit. Do not purchase this item if you think the headset is not attached to anything. Very disappointing because we already have a similar product like this and wanted a true wireless item. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Simple Simple Simple
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about audio engineering. This product says it's easy to use out of the box. That is 100% true. It couldn't have been any easier to use this product. This product does not have a microphone cable but that was ok because I used the existing one from my mic.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Q

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with our sound system!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is perfect with our system-sound quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Caughron

customer_reviews.title: Comfort that works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and works great! LOVE the flexible headband--very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much handier than a wireless stick mic on a stand. It's a Shure, you get Shure quality.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scheiner

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality microphone system for the price. I use it once a week to teach a fitness class and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney C

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Sounds really good with Bose L1 system. Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset; Excellent Seller.
customer_reviews.text: My Shure BLX14/P31 Headworn Wireless System arrived on time, was well packaged and works perfectly. It is a blessing to our speakers, who can now use their hands freely and do not have to concentrate on keeping the microphone positioned correctly. The sound is perfect. I highly recommend the system as well as the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Eddison O'Neal Fowler

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: seems to work well. the question is whether it will last very long. UPDATE: THE ANSWER IS THAT IT DOES NOT LAST. I am replacing this after less than six months!
customer_reviews.author: Wwhittin

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were clear and the systems were very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 wireless systems: 2 with the headset, and one handheld. The instructions were clear and the systems were very easy to set up. We got great volume out of all 3 mics with no interference. We were running them through a Bose L1 Compact and a Yamaha MG 06 mixer
customer_reviews.author: G. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Have several other wireless products that go a great job, just had to pay about triple the ...
customer_reviews.text: very low quality, barely will pick up voice. Was hoping to get something at this price that was at least usable. Have several other wireless products that go a great job, just had to pay about triple the price. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a refurb or used unit- had duct tape label ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing bodypack upon arrival. Looks like a refurb or used unit- had duct tape label on transmitter box. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kraynik

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: worst quality you can ever buy. Stay away from this company......not worth the money and its not working right at all. very cheap plastic made
customer_reviews.author: grad4law

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what's pictured
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. I purchased this system and this is NOT WHAT I RECEIVED! I was given a lapel microphone and no headset, despite the fact it specifically says a headset is included in its title. I am returning it and it will most likely be sold to another. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: AB

product_meta.title: Shure BLX14/P31 Wireless Microphone System with PGA31 Headset Microphone
product_meta.description: Size:P31| Style:H9: 512-542 MHzSHURE BLX WIRELESS MICROPHONE SYSTEMS. LEGENDARY SOUND, RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX. WIRELESS FREEDOM, MADE SIMPLE. Making the jump to wireless should be liberating, not challenging. Shure BLX Wireless Systems combine professional quality sound with simple setup and an intuitive interface for performance you can trust right out of the box. Precision built and available in a variety of handheld, lavalier, instrument and headset configurations, it’s the most accessible way to own the stage.
feature_bullets: Includes BLX4 wireless receiver, BLX1 body pack transmitter, PGA31 headset microphone, power supply, clothing clip, windscreens, and user guide.
300 feet (91 m) operating range (line of sight).Hold the microphone within 12 inches from the sound source

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars341 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
